mapper.sql: id, coupon_id, customer_id, coupon_no, is_use, receive_time, use_time
mapper.select: SELECT c.NAME AS NAME, c.type AS type, c.end_period_date AS endPeriodDate, c.is_forever AS isForever, send.is_use AS isUse FROM c_coupon c LEFT JOIN c_coupon_send send ON c.id = send.coupon_id WHERE c.state = 2

SELECT send.id AS couponSendId, coupon.NAME AS NAME, coupon.type AS type, coupon.full_amount AS fullAmount, coupon.cut_amount AS cutAmount, coupon.discount AS discount, coupon.end_period_date AS endPeriodDate FROM c_coupon coupon JOIN c_coupon_send send ON send.coupon_id = coupon.id where send.customer_id = #{customerId} and send.is_use = 0
